Summary: yellow orange light vanished and reappeared some distance away behind a tree then was gone.
divs: Sighting DetailsI stepped onto my deck that faces north at 12:45 AM August 3, 2012 and there was a yellow orange light, I don't know if it had been hovering or flying it was there as soon as I opened the door I saw it, slightly to the north and west of me. It vanished pretty quickly and reappeared immediatley some distance away behind a tree, and then was gone all together.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Blue Springs
There was one other sighting in Blue Springs on or around August 3rd 2012
